A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First time I’ve walked out of a theatre with the feeling that all the air had been sucked out of the room. About 40 minutes too long and multiple instances of the movie destroying the lore behind the universe. If the hope was to just void the events of the OT they could have left the Skywalker saga to end in 89 and started with a new story. Bringing these characters back just to slowly devolve the development of Han Luke and Leia is insulting. The excitement that I left The Force Awakens with for this film is no where to be found for episode 9.
